name: Beat Swing Music Neon Light
description:
Beat Swing is an action arcade game,easy one tap to play with endless world of music.
jump,dodge grab the beats and live to the end .best edm music with enjoyable experience with lots of fun.
Unlock new levels beat your friends high score improve your reflexive skill.
Every level has its own unique music.
Every level has its own unique effects.
Start your journey in Beat Swing.
Enjoy the game with endless best edm music.
